rows.label: tlk70000120_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Huff... Huff...
OK, once more from the top.
Elba Uppercut leads into...

rows.label: tlk70000120_03_msg0003
rows.name:
What, you think this is funny? You've
got to yell your own moves! Especially
the ones that look awesome!

rows.label: tlk70000120_03_msg0004
rows.name:
The chief said you can deal big damage
to an enemy if you attack them after
they've been launched into the air.

rows.label: tlk70000120_03_msg0005
rows.name:
And if you use a move that bashes
them into the ground, you'll do even
more damage!

rows.label: tlk70000120_03_msg0006
rows.name:
So which moves do you look coolest
doing? Try this out! Uppercut then
smash! Again! Uppercut then SMASH!!!
